root.name: Darkstalkers Chronicle: The Chaos Tower
root.description: OverviewDarkstalkers Chronicle: The Chaos Tower, called Vampire Chronicle The Chaos Tower in Japan, is a fighting game that consists of all the previous Darkstalkers entries and was released alongside the PlayStation Portable's launch. Originally a japan-only released Sega Dreamcast port of Vampire Savior called Vampire Chronicle for Matching Service, it included everything from prior Darkstalkers games and the ability to choose fighting styles from the previous five games for selected characters.CharactersAnakarisB.B. HoodBishamonDemitriDonovanFeliciaHsien-KoHuitzilJedahJ. TalbainLilithLord RaptorMorriganPyronQ-BeeRikuoSasquatchVictor
